route.middleware: web, auth, sms.verification.guard, verification.guard, user.google.two.factor, system.maintenance

statements.sql: select * from information_schema.tables where table_schema = 'bullion_plus' and table_name = 'script' and table_type = 'BASE TABLE'
select column_name as `column_name` from information_schema.columns where table_schema = 'bullion_plus' and table_name = 'temporary_datas'
select count(*) as aggregate from `payment_gateway_currencies` where `alias` = 'add-money-paystack-ngn-automatic'
select count(*) as aggregate from `payment_gateway_currencies` where `alias` = 'add-money-paystack-ngn-automatic'
select * from `payment_gateway_currencies` where `payment_gateway_currencies`.`payment_gateway_id` in (12) order by `id` desc
select * from `user_wallets` where `user_id` = 1 and exists (select * from `currencies` where `user_wallets`.`currency_id` = `currencies`.`id` and `code` = 'USD') limit 1

insert into `transactions` (`type`, `trx_id`, `user_type`, `user_id`, `wallet_id`, `payment_gateway_currency_id`, `request_amount`, `request_currency`, `exchange_rate`, `percent_charge`, `fixed_charge`, `total_charge`, `total_payable`, `receive_amount`, `receiver_type`, `receiver_id`, `available_balance`, `payment_currency`, `remark`, `details`, `status`, `callback_ref`, `invoice`, `created_at`) values ('ADD-MONEY', 'NZyimoPaFeGEPDmm', 'USER', 1, 1, 33, '20', 'USD', 802.7, 481.62, 1, 482.62, 16536.62, '20', 'USER', 1, 100267.06, 'NGN', 'ADD MONEY With PayStack', '{\"gateway_response\":{\"status\":true,\"message\":\"Authorization URL created\",\"data\":{\"authorization_url\":\"https:\/\/checkout.paystack.com\/u4bjvszd0vvj5bb\",\"access_code\":\"u4bjvszd0vvj5bb\",\"reference\":\"nX2DRBA3KV8lP46pUoc2vTxZhBQPC82Ogow46D2CsNo421cXSMbe63VGFEYO\"}}}', 1, '', '', '2025-08-19 20:11:46')

insert into `transaction_devices` (`transaction_id`, `ip`, `mac`, `city`, `country`, `longitude`, `latitude`, `timezone`, `browser`, `os`) values (56, '127.0.0.1', '', 'New Haven', 'United States', -72.92, 41.31, 'America/New_York', 'Chrome', 'OS X')

mails.subject: Add Money Via PayStack NGN
mails.headers:
From: Bullion Plus <support@bullion-plus.com>
To: iheonu6@gmail.com
Subject: Add Money Via PayStack NGN
mails.body:
[Bullion](http://localhost:8000)

# Hello John Doe !

Your add money request successful via PayStack NGN ,details of add money:

request Amount: 20 USD

Exchange Rate:  1 USD = 802.7 NGN

Fees & Charges: 482.62 NGN

Will Get: 20 USD

Total Payable Amount: 16536.62 NGN

TRX_ID: NZyimoPaFeGEPDmm

Status: Success

Date And Time: 2025-08-19 08:11:46 PM

Thank you for using our application!

Regards,
Bullion

© 2025 Bullion. All rights reserved.
